title: How to Generate Video - Intro to Deep Learning #15
excerpt: Generative Adversarial Networks. It's time. We're going to use a Deep Convolutional GAN to generate images of the alien language from the movie arrival that we can then stitch together to animate into video. I'll go over the architecture of a GAN and then we'll implement one ourselves!  Code for this
